website_summaries.verdict: Being the first of the many, the Keds Champion Spring proves that despite being a refashioned Champion Original and its simplistic design, it still stands out from the crowd. Because it possesses all the qualities that are needed for a shoe, it is not surprising how it is favored by many and withstood the test of time.Keds certainly couldn't choose a more appropriate name for the silhouette. More so, the new colorways that blend in perfectly for spring only give a refreshing look that suits the blossoming spring season.
pros: Several users highly appreciated the two sets of laces that it comes with
These basic shoes do not disappoint as it meets the expectations of its users, according to several of its reviewers
A couple of buyers highly appreciated how these sneakers can easily be cleaned through machine washing and can hold its shape after
As opposed to white sneakers, the colorways of the Keds Champion Spring does not show up dirt easily, cited by some wearers
Few of the buyers noted that the picture depicted on the website is the same as the actual
Each of the colorways is unique and perfect for spring, said one of the shoppers
It makes the perfect companion for traveling as it is comfortable and barely takes a room in a suitcase, said one tester
Its design is feminine, stylish, and timeless, according to many
The cotton canvas has a weave pattern that creates an interesting but subtle detail on the overall look of the sneaker, mentioned by one user
A Keds fan dubbed the Keds Champion Spring as her favorite
cons: One felt disappointed that these slip badly on the heel
Several of the users noted that these are on the narrow side

customer_reviews.title: Run about 1/2 too big for me. Narrow but long. Nice shoes though!!
customer_reviews.text: The shoe is longer than I thought. Quite a lot of extra toe room.. my foot would slide forward and my heel would pop out. I got them for a great price, and they're still wearable so I'm happy. These ones will get more use on the thick socks days in the winter! I also was able to get another pair of keds (at regular price) that fit perfectly by going 1/2 size down! The cushioning sold them for me. I love the look of flat shoes but some flats are just so devoid of any comfort. These I can say feel really nice!! That's why I decided to get another (smaller) pair in a different color.
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: good canvas shoe
customer_reviews.text: Good quality canvas in this shoe. The size is as stated and the toe is gently rounded. I bought this in a 1/2 size larger than I wear so I can wear a sock. Mine is in mint green and a nice color I will be wearing them for a long walk today for the first time. UPDATE There was no real cushion to the shoe so I added a gel insert after trying them on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: glrz

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Melon Colored Tennies!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the peach colored shoes. I was surprised to find there's enough padding that I am able to walk in them without a problem. I usually have to have a lot of arch support. They have little of that, but feel very padded and comfortable. It's a hard to find color and I'm very happy to have them. If your foot is very wide, you might need to look for a wide, though. They aren't extremely narrow...but wouldn't work if your foot is in the D or DD category.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Chilton

customer_reviews.title: In love with the color. Cute & Comf!
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear a 7 but from buying previous keds I knew to go down a 1/2 size. These fit perfectly! Quite comfy for a shoe that looks totally flat. There's more cushion than you'd expect. Hard to wear with socks tho (even the "no show" or "low ankle" socks look funky. Time to stock up in those extra super low socks for the fall!!
customer_reviews.author: Christie

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe, a little snug
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 similar pairs that fit differently. I’m hoping these break in soon, but are pretty snug on the toes.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Corson

customer_reviews.title: Tried and True
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wearing Keds forever and this pair is just as nice as always. I have narrow feet and Keds fit great. I usually wear a size 8 shoe but I wear 7.5 in Keds. There is plenty of toe room and my feet don’t slip out of the shoe. Keds peach shade looks great with several of my clothes. I recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Lex

customer_reviews.title: Good ole’ Keds
customer_reviews.text: I’m solid size 8. I rarely need a different size and the 8 fit perfect. Keds are a bit expensive and this color was on sale. I like wearing them with capris, yoga pants and even sundresses. They wash nicely. ( I air dry them.)
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia S.

customer_reviews.title: AHA!  Cool-colored Keds in a size wide!
customer_reviews.text: I wear Keds all summer and wash them in the machine. But the cool colors are usually not available in the wide size. This one is REALLY cool - mint green. And it even comes with two sets of laces ; one white as usual, but the other just a tad darker than the canvas green. These are COOL!
customer_reviews.author: nyackjudy

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat keds!
customer_reviews.text: These are the same wonderful keds that have been around for years. I now have 3 pair! They are very attractive and comfortable. The lavendar color is subtle and pretty
customer_reviews.author: lauri

customer_reviews.title: SHERBET KEDS!
customer_reviews.text: The best summer Keds. Perfect fit, so comfortable & love the sherbet color! Recommend.🧡
customer_reviews.author: Maddie

customer_reviews.title: The width
customer_reviews.text: I did not find the shoes to be wide. Measured them up to other wides and they are medium. I like the shoe but I can not wear them.
customer_reviews.author: Betty Dunn

customer_reviews.title: Quite Large
customer_reviews.text: Love Keds and ordered an 8-1/2, my usual size. BUT these are being returned as they are huge. Sorely disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nekkosan

customer_reviews.title: Great colors.
customer_reviews.text: Just know that this is the basic level of Keds. I kept these because of the color, but they have little support. I won’t wear them everyday as I do with the more substantial keds.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Williamson

customer_reviews.title: Ked's
customer_reviews.text: Way too narrow, but the Coral color was striking. Returning item for a Wide.
customer_reviews.author: G Price

customer_reviews.title: nice pair of shoes
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my mom, since finding a size 5 in a regular store is practically impossible, and she just loved them. Would recommend them to others.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Consistent Fit
customer_reviews.text: I love Keds. The fit is consistent with the original styles. Like the fresh new colors.
customer_reviews.author: Sharbelle

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: i liked the product and have purchased more than one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy shoes
customer_reviews.text: Keds are a favorite of mine, always comfortable. Love the color and fit as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Christi

customer_reviews.title: Cute sneaker in a nice color.
customer_reviews.text: Cute sneakers in a nice color! Hard to find a size 5, but these fit well.
customer_reviews.author: K. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Favorite sneakers to this day.
customer_reviews.text: These were a little stiffer in the toe box than my other pairs. Only for like the first couple of hours though. I could walk for days in these.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Scott

customer_reviews.title: de-laminating after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Had these for 6 months now. Love, but the white edging is de-laminating from the rubber sole. Nothing I cant fix with glue though.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Link

customer_reviews.title: Run a little big
customer_reviews.text: I first bought then in blue and in this color I don’t know why they run a little bit wide and large (even tho they aren’t wide)
customer_reviews.author: Beatriz Nyerges

customer_reviews.title: Love my Keds
customer_reviews.text: Great little everyday sneakers for wearing with jeans or khakis or shorts.
customer_reviews.author: PLC111

customer_reviews.title: didn't fit
customer_reviews.text: I returned them as they were too large around the shoe opening
customer_reviews.author: Jo Anne English

customer_reviews.title: Runs narrow, but otherwise great!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a shoe that could swing dance in and these were perfect! If you are debating getting a wide or regular I would recommend getting the wide.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I love them and wear them most days. They go with many different outfits.
customer_reviews.author: Katelyn Lynch

customer_reviews.title: as expected
customer_reviews.text: Keds shoes were what I ordered. Happy with the product
customer_reviews.author: alex barry

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love. Usually get size 8. Ordered half size down and got 7.5. Fit perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Czerwinski

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are great, fit well and came with 2 pair of laces, one white, one blue! Will definitely order again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M.

customer_reviews.title: Super Cute and Comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and fit. I bought another pair for my mom in the coral color!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: I agree with all of the other reviews - these are NOT what they used to be. Uncomfortable, poor fit, fabric is tough and doesn't flex well, and no padding. I would expect this from ten buck shoes from the big box stores, but not from Keds!! I am done with this brand, unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: NashvilleLady333

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality!
customer_reviews.text: I rarely give bad reviews but I bought these shoes primarily for work but after about 2 or 3 weeks they began falling apart! I thought Keds was a pretty decent company as they have been around forever but they must not be doing too hot if they put out these poorly made shoes. Also, the fit on these are extremely narrow.. If you do decide to waste your money on these, I suggest you buy them in wide.
customer_reviews.author: kate

customer_reviews.title: VERY COMFORTABLE - GREAT IN WIDE WIDTHS
customer_reviews.text: These are a great comfortable knock around sneaker especially if you have wide feet. I'm a 9 1/2 wide and they fit perfectly. Extremely comfortable. I would have given them 5 stars if they didn't have labels with the Keds name sewn in and glued everywhere around the sneaker. I wear these with dresses and it takes away from the simple match your outfit sneaker. Otherwise they are great
customer_reviews.author: Roni B

customer_reviews.title: too big
customer_reviews.text: I needed a pair of casual sneaks in black, thought keds would be perfect and they have wide sizes and i have wide feet! BUT I ordered a size 9, which is always my shoe size, and the 9 C/D was too big, my toe is almost an inch back from the top of the sneaker, the width seemed good though. I'm nervous about ordering a 8.5 in normal width (no wides in that size) so I'm getting vans instead
customer_reviews.author: Ruby

customer_reviews.title: Good sole, needs to be broken in.
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, good thick sole. Fit perfectly with thin socks, which is my preference. The backs rubbed on my heels, and took a long time to break in.
customer_reviews.author: Kelsey

customer_reviews.title: They were just SUPER uncomfortable. I think for the money
customer_reviews.text: Smallest dang shoes I've ever purchased in my life. Order a whole size up from your regular size if you want them to fit, and perhaps a bit wider than normal. They were just SUPER uncomfortable.I think for the money, they weren't worth it. Next time, I'm just ordering plain, "canvas shoes." I'm not paying for the 'Keds" label.
customer_reviews.author: CA woman

customer_reviews.title: I received the shoes today and in the box was ...
customer_reviews.text: I received the shoes today and in the box was one black sneaker and one olive colored one. This is ridiculous!
customer_reviews.author: Susan Byrne

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in these shoes (black Keds, white trim)
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the other reviews, I hesitated to purchase these Keds but decided to take a chance anyway. That was a mistake. The Keds that arrived the other day are nothing like I remember (and I lived in Keds for many years). These are a very cheap version of the sturdy, supportive Keds of yesteryear that fit like a glove and lasted forever. The new ones are also quite a bit narrower, thinner, pointed in the toe, and feel like something you'd get at a dollar store for a few bucks. Returning this product for a refund and won't be purchasing Keds in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Wrong display picture!
customer_reviews.text: Well in one of the descriptive pictures the bottom of the shoe is all black! The shoes I received were a brown rubber color on the bottom of the shoe. Also in another picture, the shoe inside is white and the shoes I received were blue inside. They are not as comfortable as a pair of keds that I owned years before.
customer_reviews.author: MichelleCM

customer_reviews.title: Love Love Love
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable! Love it! Looks great with skinny jeans. DIdn't know it came with white laces so I bought it beforehand.. oh wells. Love it! looks so clean and cute.
customer_reviews.author: GongJu

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Extremely narrow. I should've read other reviews before I bought these!
customer_reviews.author: Moriah

customer_reviews.title: Still cute if you get the right size!
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved Keds sockless. They have a cute look thats always fashionable and they go with anything from skirts, shorts, jeans, capri, leggings & dresses. Although they have changed over the years they are still my go to sneakers. Buy from a store or try them on to get the perfect size and width combo that hugs your feet perfectly. Then order online if you want.
customer_reviews.author: Shaniah

customer_reviews.title: Made in China
customer_reviews.text: They are not the Keds the were made in the USA. These made in china are uncomfortable and stiff.
customer_reviews.author: Ted F.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to wear in the spring/summer. I'm always skeptical about buying shoes online as some styles run bigger or smaller than others. I am usually a size 6, ordered a size 6 and they fit me perfectly so they do run true to size. These are comfortable and they do have cushion. I would have returned them if they didn't because me heels need it. I ordered them in white and they arrived in perfect condition. I can't wait to wear these with shorts, skinny jeans, capris and casual dresses.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie_and_David

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, but not washable so why buy
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable, but once you wash them (by hand or washer), they will be ruined. Such a bad design. Canvas shoes should be washable. I purchased white and after washing then they turned blue. Otherwise, I love how comfortable they are, but they need to improve. You can't wear them dirty.
customer_reviews.author: hyuliya81

customer_reviews.title: More Comfortable Than Regular Sneakers - Molds to My Feet!
customer_reviews.text: This pair of Keds fits my feet just perfectly and they are so comfortable on my feet. You see I was concerned because I have very flat feet and when I stand or walk around in regular (non sneaker types of shoes), then I find that my feet ache. However, when I wear these Keds, even all day, my feet feel great. And I have tried many different support type of shoes and none worked for me. Strangely, the Keds work for me. So let me tell you this: These are 100% recommended by me and by my happy feet!
customer_reviews.author: Daisy STop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: quality???
customer_reviews.text: I bought the white leather sneakers for $38 at a DSW store awhile ago. Let me tell you, they do NOT last. I bought Keds hoping for a quality, practical, and stylish shoe that I could wear with anything for a few years. This is what you could expect a few years ago, that Keds were STRONG shoes. Well surprise, they barely lasted one season. The bottom sole of the shoe came unglue from the rest of the shoe, and most of the white leather chipped off leaving patches of brown. Looks terrible, no way worth my $40.
customer_reviews.author: musique

customer_reviews.title: Only ones that fit me!
customer_reviews.text: Stone canvas Keds are the only ones that fit my strangely wide feet. Actually, I alternate between black, white and stone. Oh, and the heavy, ugly, orthopedic shoes recommended by my podiatrist. When I need a break from the ugliness or the heaviness I turn to my keds in 8.5 EE. Mind you, Amazon doesn't carry that size. I have to go to one of the other online vendors. I don't know if these are exactly like they were in my childhood. I just know that 8-8.5 in EE fits my deformed feet. I sort of wish I could get them here......
customer_reviews.author: C. Lamont

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I haven't worn sneakers in years because they always seemed a bit tacky for an old lady. I bought the all black ones and found that they not only were comfortable but looked great as well. They ran true to size and have enough support to be worn without my normal arch supports (I told you I was an old lady!). For just $25, they're a real bargain. I'll probably buy at least one more pair and maybe I'll be wild and get the red ones ;)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara B.

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed in the new Keds design
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed in the new Keds design!! They have always in the past had a thick padding to stand on & a high arch support for the most comfortable shoes ever. However, they have changed their design & now have thinner padding & NO arch support. Dear Keds, Bring back the old design!!!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Janice R Adkins

customer_reviews.title: Great typical Keds
customer_reviews.text: We ordered the white canvas in a size 7.5, her usual size. The 7.5 was too long and we are reordering the 7. She has some keds already in a 7.5, but does have one other pair that we had to reorder in the 7. I am now sure why there is a difference and they do not all run the same.
customer_reviews.author: Grandmama

customer_reviews.title: Poor Quality, Deceptive Photo
customer_reviews.text: I bought my black Keds last winter. Within 6 months, there was a hole in the canvas above the toe of the left shoe. (Not because the shoe was too small, but because the canvas was extremely thin.) Also, the soles look much thicker in the photos than in reality.
customer_reviews.author: riverscircus

customer_reviews.title: Runs large
customer_reviews.text: I received this as a gift. I don't usually have an issue with shoes and sizes but this is a good 1/2 to full size too large.
customer_reviews.author: katydid

customer_reviews.title: Severe Allergic Reaction!!!
customer_reviews.text: Since 2011 Keds has been using a chemical on their shoes that causes a severe skin reaction. Beware! My daughter had suffered with a blistering rash on her feet that was hard to cure. She stopped wearing the Keds, but did not realize it was the Keds that caused the rash until she bought another pair this year. She researched online and found there are others who report this same reaction to Keds shoes that are manufactured after 2011.
customer_reviews.author: V. Smith

customer_reviews.title: True to size and comfy
customer_reviews.text: LOVE these. Got them in grey with yellow laces- LOVE this color combo. They are true to size, comfy with or without socks (thin socks), and clean very easy. I use oxyclean spray and/or put them in the washer and they come out squeaky clean. So glad I got these!
customer_reviews.author: AA

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: I wore these about twice a week for about 5 weeks before they began splitting apart. To late too return them now so it was a waste of money. Very disappointed in the quality. I wore Keds for years and never had any problems with quality. Will not buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Englshfrk

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT SHOES!!
customer_reviews.text: SCREW WHAT EVERYONE ELSE IS SAYING! I purchased these and they came within 3 days. They are VERY comfortable, light, goes with anything you wear, and they are cheap. I bought some from Payless and these are WAAAAAAAAAY better :)
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Beware - Keds are not washable
customer_reviews.text: You can't wash Keds. If you do, they shrink & fade with first wash. Customer Service was lame - they can't replace a defective product with style/color of your choice because - somehow - they don't have access to their own warehouses! ?? For $40-50, these are not a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: Save New Orleans

customer_reviews.title: Not for wide feet
customer_reviews.text: I love these shoes! And after you get them broken in (takes a little while), they are adorable and comfy! But they are definitely not for people with wide feet. They seem to run a little narrower than shoes I normally buy. But they're fantastic shoes nonetheless!
customer_reviews.author: BraidedClimber

customer_reviews.title: They look cool, but now they are totally ripped to shreds
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes exactly one year ago. They look cool, but now they are totally ripped to shreds. The insert foot pad in the shoe is sticking out of the hole that is ripped in the back of the shoes. Poorly made. Probably made my exploited Chinese children. Get something more durable even if you end up paying a little more, and something that doesn't promote child exploitation.
customer_reviews.author: johnfaldridge

customer_reviews.title: Leather Grasshoppers
customer_reviews.text: I have Peripheral Neuropathy and the Keds in leather are very uncomfortable shoes. I use extra wide for swelling and one size larger and they are still uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: MJ  Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable shoes
customer_reviews.text: Love these boat shoes. A+++++for comfort in the front toes and back heel. Hope they sell other colors. Nice construction.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn, Princess

customer_reviews.title: White Shoes turned Blue bc of Innersole
customer_reviews.text: Bought these 3 months ago, tossed them in the wash w cold water to remove clay soil, royal blue inner soles faded all over the shoes turning them into a blue and white mess. I've washed dozens of shoes (keds included) over the years without a problem. Same thing happened to my black keds, the inside is now various shades of blue.
customer_reviews.author: SS in NC

customer_reviews.title: Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Fit is as I expected. Love to wear them whenever I leave the house as they match any pants and walkshorts that I wear.
customer_reviews.author: Sabrina Crisp

customer_reviews.title: Keds are wonderful!
customer_reviews.text: These Keds are everything the seller described. Size runs true to form, they are extremely comfortable and look great!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia A. Keeley

customer_reviews.title: Keds a rip off
customer_reviews.text: These shoes arrived yesterday I call them shoes not real Keds. No lining paper like insole. I have been wearing Keds for many years and these are a cheap imitation plus they added a large Keds ad on the top of the tongue, real Keds did not have this. Shame on you!
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Super comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: Love these shoes, they're so comfortable! I'm kind of inclined to order one in each color ;) One thing that should be noted - these have no arch support so if that's important to you bear that in mind when ordering.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon V

customer_reviews.title: love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased blk/blk and absolutely love it! I got 8W becasue I have wide feet but when I received it was bit too wide. I'm going to get regular instead of wide next time I purchase my second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Heds

customer_reviews.title: Quality is lacking
customer_reviews.text: I have an old pair of these shoes that I have loved for a long time, but needed to replace. I ordered this pair and was very disappointed in the quality. I have only worn these shoes perhaps a dozen times and the sole is already coming apart. They also have this weird squeak with every step that I take. I will be replacing these, but will not purchase another Keds shoe.
customer_reviews.author: carel

customer_reviews.title: A bit too tight at first
customer_reviews.text: they were a bit too tight on the first day and it really hurt my heel
customer_reviews.author: Mindy Case
